name: Nori
description:
Nori is a solo developed platformer game about a little cat named Nori and their quest for bringing their mother back to life. Currently, the project is in early development, and updates will be posted once new levels are finished.

Story

Meet Nori, a cute little cat that was living his happy little everyday life. Or were they really happy? Probably not, since, by some unfortunate event, their mother passed away.

That was until one day, when Nori saw their mother in a dream so real, one could swear it really happened. Join Nori in this life-changing adventure for the legendary Anima Mirror.

Controls

This game has a fully functional key-binding system that allows you to customize your gaming experience. There are, currently, 5 basic actions:

• Horizontal movement;

• Jump;

• Crouching;

• Dashing;

• Climbing.
